parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Broken Commands </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> System </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Unlocks the given achievement. The achievements are listed in CfgAchievements, however none of the currently listed achievements is used in Arma 3, hence the command always returns [[false]].<br></br>

<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command is obsolete and was used in the experimental (unreleased) <template><title>arma2</title></template> Xbox 360 version as stated
[https://forums.bohemia.net/forums/topic/187873-unlockachievment-command/?tab<template><title>=</title></template>comments#comment-2978436 here]. </value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3 </title><part><name index="1"/><value> To unlock a [[Arma 3 Stat Names|Steam Achievement]] for <template><title>arma3</title></template>, see [[setStatValue]].</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[unlockAchievement]] name </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - achievement name </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if achievement was unlocked</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isUnlocked = [[unlockAchievement]] "Hunter";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>[[setStatValue]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>
